QuestData.Title: Going West
QuestData.Description: Leza now walks with the ancestors of this strange land. I must look now to the living.$b$bKor has led a group of our scouts west deeper into the jungle.$b$bI sent a scout of my own to investigate the crane temple. Please, $p, seek out my scout, get their report, then meet up with Kor and lend what aid you can to him.$b$bWe will join you as quickly as we are able.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Sunwalker Scout near the Crane Temple.
